column5: Just moved recently to Markham. ON. and i wonder if any of the members could guide me for good fishing spots here on the east side. around an hour driving. or less from Markham . Thanks in advance

Bluffers Park, rouge river down by the lake, Rice Lake Bewdley, Lake Simcoe, just to name a few. Simcoe is very close to you so try there first, take a drive and take your rod with you assuming you are fishing from shore. Maybe tell us what you like to fish for and how long you have been fishing.  when people join the board , they usually introduce themselves  ...just saying
